price: 17. Ee Xurmad weyneeya Allaah oo ka hufa (ceeb iyo nuqsaan iyo inuu leeyahay wax shariig ah ama xaas ama ilmo) markaad galabsataan (salaadaha Maghribka iyo Cishaha) iyo markaad waabariisataan (salaadda Subax).
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
